^^^^^^^^^^^^
monster_logd
^^^^^^^^^^^^

Usage: ``monster_logd [options] <log_root>``

Arguments
~~~~~~~~~

log_root:
	the directory where logfiles should be stored

Options
~~~~~~~

-p/--port=PORT:
	the port to listen on. The default is 13000.

-T/--no-timestamps
	if provided, messages will not be prefixed with a timestamp


Discussion
~~~~~~~~~~
